players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night. He's a threat to us all."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game. Let's work together to identify the real mafia among us."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night. He's a threat to us all."
You: "Let's focus on the fact that Diana was found dead last night. We need to figure out who killed her and why."
Charlie: "I'm shocked and saddened by Diana's death. Let us not jump to conclusions, but rather work together to gather information and find out who could have done this."
